an11.4:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an11.4:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an11.4:2.2: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam,
an11.4:2.3: pamojje asati pamojjavipannassa hatupanisa hoti piti,
an11.4:2.4: pitiya asati pitivipannassa hatupanisa hoti passaddhi,
an11.4:2.5: passaddhiya asati passaddhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti sukham,
an11.4:2.6: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi,
an11.4:2.7: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam,
an11.4:2.8: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupanisa hoti nibbida,
an11.4:2.9: nibbidaya asati nibbidavipannassa hatupaniso hoti virago,
an11.4:2.10: virage asati viragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an11.4:3.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an11.4:3.2: Evamevam kho, avuso, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti avippatisaro,
an11.4:3.3: avippatisare asati avippatisaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti pamojjam …pe…
an11.4:4.1: Silavato, avuso, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro,
an11.4:4.2: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam,
an11.4:4.3: pamojje sati pamojjasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti piti,
an11.4:4.4: pitiya sati pitisampannassa upanisasampanna hoti passaddhi,
an11.4:4.5: passaddhiya sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti sukham,
an11.4:4.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi,
an11.4:4.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam,
an11.4:4.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanna hoti nibbida,
an11.4:4.9: nibbidaya sati nibbidasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virago,
an11.4:4.10: virage sati viragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an11.4:5.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi paripurim gacchati.
an11.4:5.2: Evamevam kho, avuso, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippatisaro,
an11.4:5.3: avippatisare sati avippatisarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti pamojjam …pe…
